inclusion.criterion: blood pressure ≥ 140/90 mmHg with one antihypertensive drug or 150/100 mHg for untreated patients
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: plasma LDL-cholesterol concentrations > 2,5mm/L (without concomitant hypolipidemic drugs)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least one additional cardiovascular risk factor apart of arterial hypertension
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: minimal thickness of intima media complex at least 0,8 mm.
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: premenopausal females with potential for pregnancy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor or angiotensin receptor blocker therapy in the previous 3 months,
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism. He smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years and alcohol consumption of 5 to 6 beers per week.
